Articles.Content:
False. I try not to hate things that can't hate me back.

The user below me is not below me.

False.

The user below me speaks an Asian language.

So true, I know Russian!

The user below lives in South Africa :^I

False, Czech Republic.

The user below me has over 175 cm of height (5 ft 8 inch).

False. I am 2 inches too short.

The user below me is under 21 years old.

False. 29.

The user below me has seen Kill Bill (either volume).

Nope, sadly. It sounds like a good movie though.

The user below me likes electro swing music.

YES! I enjoy me some Caravan Palace!

The user below me has heard about Geocaching.

false

the user below me knows what that is

True, know about it, done it (though it's been a few years).

The user below me has been in handcuffs.

False.

The user below me doesn't like what Greenpeace do.

True. They're too uppity about it all.

The user below me hadn't bought a new keyboard for their PC in >3 years.

true for i have been using my first laptop for 2 years already(i have however built it a new cooling pad out of K'nex with a cup holder, and a mouse pad)

the user below me still messes with legos even though people think they are too old for it

False. The last time I played with legos was when it was acceptable for me.

The user below me plays KSP vanilla.

True... except for soundtrack editor.

The user below me will deny this statement truthfully. <insert evil face here>

False, logic traps only work on robots.

The user below me has never rowed a boat.

false although it was a catamaran

the user below me has played both portal games

True. Albeit I only completed co-op mode with my friend and never got a chance with single player.

The user below me has eaten German cuisine.

False, but just 9 generations ago my ancestors came from Germany and England from the Celtic tribe.

The user below me has kwrocketry mod installed.

False, stock parts only, but lots of other mods.

The user below me just got ninja'd.

Nope.

The user below me plays Gnomoria.

I played it. Once. Then I came back to DF.

The user below me has read the Boatmurdered tale to the very end.

false.

The user below me is registered on the KSP Forums.

Obviously.

The user below me has played portal (either 1 or 2)

True i have both and i have beaten them dozens of times

the user below me has played any of the half-life two games
